alert.note: Alert for Preble (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 8:15AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEAST INDIANA AND SOUTHWEST OHIO THROUGH 9 AM... At 814 AM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Connersville to Olde West Chester, moving southwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph, frequent cloud-to-ground lightning, and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Lightning can cause serious injury or death. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Cincinnati, Hamilton, Fairfield, Mason, Oxford, Forest Park, Sharonville, Connersville, Blue Ash, Springdale, Reading, Montgomery, Harrison, North College Hill, Wyoming, Cheviot, Mount Healthy, Brookville, Cambridge City, and Bright. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Indiana between mile markers 134 and 135. I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 17 and 18, and near mile marker 22. I-74 in Indiana between mile markers 161 and 171. I-74 in Ohio between mile markers 0 and 19. I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 4 and 23. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. When thunder roars, go indoors! Do not stay in the open or seek shelter under trees when lightning threatens. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
